about_the_game:
Doomsday Survival Guide



  • Last Man's Duty
As the sole surviving man, fulfill your duty by forming intimate bonds with the female survivors, forging a path to the rebirth of the human race in the most passionate ways.

  • Intimate Dilemmas
Manage your interactions with the females, some of whom may harbor intense desires while others resent your unique position. Make choices that will ignite passions and foster intimacy, all while ensuring the survival of your newfound society.


  • Stock Up Resources
Gather as many items as you can every time you go out to explore. Baseball bats, nails, torches, batteries, and even plant seeds may all come in handy.

  • Make Weapons for Self-defense
Anything goes when it comes to survival. Mace and zip guns are great weapons for fighting the dead. You must always be ready to fight.


  • Upgrade Your Shelter
A makeshift shelter made of a few planks is certainly not safe enough. To survive and thrive in the last days, you must keep reinforcing and upgrading your shelter, set traps around it, build walls, and expand your storage space.

  • Go Out to Explore
You have to come out of your shelter to gather supplies every once in a while. You may find food and items necessary to upgrade your shelter in abandoned buildings, factories, etc.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains revealing clothing, character portrait and partial nudity. This game does not contain depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm. All characters are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Card (DirectX 10 capabilities)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 above
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Card (DirectX 10 capabilities)

short_description: You're the sole survivor of a global virus that wiped out all men. In this apocalyptic world, your mission is to survive and foster intimate relationships with the most outstanding female survivors, sparking the resurgence of humanity in an epic adventure.
